name: CLP_EOB_CAS_CLM
description: This table contains claim-level Claim Adjustment Segment (CAS) data for non-primary claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim print database record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EOB_CAS_CLM_CVG_ID
columns.description: The coverage record ID for the claim-level explanation of benefits adjustment.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_CAS_GRP_C_NAME
columns.description: The claim-level explanation of benefits adjustment group code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_CAS_RMT_CD
columns.description: The claim-level explanation of benefits adjustment reason code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_CAS_AMT
columns.description: The claim-level explanation of benefits adjustment amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_CAS_QTY
columns.description: The claim-level explanation of benefits adjustment quantity.
